questions.question: Which of the following is a type of proximity switch?
Which of the following is NOT a factor that affects the sensing range of a proximity switch?

answers.a: A. Material of the object being sensed

questions.question: What is the sensing range of a proximity switch?

answers.a: The distance from the switch to the object being sensed
answers.b: The size of the object being sensed
answers.c: The type of material the object being sensed is made of
answers.d: The temperature of the object being sensed

questions.question: Which of the following is an application for a capacitive proximity switch?

answers.c: Sensing objects in a high-temperature environment
answers.d: Sensing objects in a low-temperature environment

questions.question: Which of the following is a disadvantage of using a capacitive proximity switch?

answers.b: Susceptibility to interference from other objects
answers.d: Only able to sense metallic objects
